summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 49th Avenue Southwest from West Dakota Street to West Andover Street, and certain other alleys, avenues and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15609 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
